song.eTitle: Just When I Need Him Most

verses.refrain: Just when I need Him most, Just when I need Him most; Jesus is near to comfort and cheer, Just when I need Him most.
verses.verse: Just when I need Him, Jesus is near, Just when I falter, just when I fear; Ready to help me, ready to cheer, Just when I need him most.
Just when I need Him, Jesus is true, Never forsaking all the way thro'; Giving for burdens pleasures anew, Just when I need him most.
Just when I need Him, He is my all. Answering when upon Him I call: Tenderly watching lest I should fall, Just when I need Him most;
